Uses of Class
socialmedia.NotActionablelPostException

Packages that use NotActionablelPostException
Package Description
socialmedia  

  • Uses of NotActionablelPostException in socialmedia

    Methods in socialmedia that throw NotActionablelPostException
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int BadSocialMedia.commentPost​(java.lang.String handle, int id, java.lang.String message)  
    int SocialMediaPlatform.commentPost​(java.lang.String handle, int id, java.lang.String message)
    The method creates a comment post referring to an existing post, similarly to a reply on Twitter.
    int BadSocialMedia.endorsePost​(java.lang.String handle, int id)  
    int SocialMediaPlatform.endorsePost​(java.lang.String handle, int id)
    The method creates an endorsement post of an existing post, similarly to a retweet on Twitter.
    java.lang.StringBuilder BadSocialMedia.showPostChildrenDetails​(int id)  
    java.lang.StringBuilder SocialMediaPlatform.showPostChildrenDetails​(int id)
    The method builds a StringBuilder showing the details of the current post and all its children posts.
